MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L19 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Meredith Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:36AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the fault on the underground cable network at Wharedale Street affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:55AM on 05 November 2020.
